name: The Waiting Room (ellien_iblock)
description:
The user will navigate through an environment which echoes the impact of the surreal, eerie space around the world currently.  We are confined to our homes, but still have the internet. This project is drawn to users that are currently logged on.

Press space bar to jump on the blue tiles to get to the other space. Refresh if you fall out of the world.

World building, modelling and sound by Ellie Niblock.

Supported by The Arts Council of Northern Ireland 2020-2021.
